Wisdom: إِنَّ هَذِهِ النُّفُوسَ طُلَعَةٌ إِنْ تُطِيعُوهَا تَنْزِعُ بِكُمْ إِلَى شَرِّ غَايَةٍ
enWisdom: Restrain these souls for indeed they are very desirous, and if you follow them, they will lead you towards the worst evil

Wisdom: إِنَّ هَذِهِ النَّفْسَ لَأَمَّارَةٌ بِالسُّوءِ فَمَنْ أَهْمَلَهَا جَمَحَتْ بِهِ إِلَى الْمَآثِمِ
enWisdom: Verily this soul commands towards evil so one who neglects it [and does not discipline it] is indomitably driven by it towards sins

Wisdom: إِنَّ طَاعَةَ النَّفْسِ وَمُتَابَعَةَ أَهْوِيَتِهَا أُسُّ كُلِّ مِحْنَةٍ وَرَأْسُ كُلِّ غَوَايَةٍ
enWisdom: Verily obeying the self and following its vain desires is the root of every tribulation and the cornerstone of every aberrance

Wisdom: إِنَّ نَفْسَكَ لَخَدُوعٌ إِنْ تَثِقْ بِهَا يَقْتَدِكَ الشَّيْطَانُ إِلَى ارْتِكَابِ الْمَحَارِمِ
enWisdom: Verily your soul is a deceiver; if you trust it, Satan will lead you to commit forbidden acts

Wisdom: إِنَّ النَّفْسَ لَأَمَّارَةٌ بِالسُّوءِ وَالْفَحْشَاءِ فَمَنِ ائْتَمَنَهَا خَانَتْهُ وَمَنِ اسْتَنَامَ إِلَيْهَا أَهْلَكَتْهُ وَمَنْ رَضِيَ عَنْهَا أَوْرَدَتْهُ شَرَّ الْمَوَارِدِ
enWisdom: Verily the soul commands towards evil and indecency, so whoever trusts it, it deceives him and whoever has confidence in it, it destroys him and whoever is pleased with it, it makes him enter the worst of places

Wisdom: إِنَّكَ إِنْ مَلَكَتْ نَفْسُكَ قِيَادَكَ أَفْسَدَتْ مَعَادَكَ وَأَوْرَدَتْكَ بَلَاءً لَا يَنْتَهِي وَشَقَاءً لَا يَنْقَضِي
enWisdom: Verily if you give your [carnal] soul control over yourself, you will corrupt your Hereafter and put you into unending affliction and incessant wretchedness

Wisdom: إِنَّكُمْ إِنْ أَطَعْتُمْ أَنْفُسَكُمْ نَزَعَتْ بِكُمْ إِلَى شَرِّ غَايَةٍ
enWisdom: Verily if you obey your [carnal] souls, they will lead you towards the worst end

Wisdom: خَالِفْ نَفْسَكَ تَسْتَقِمْ وَخَالِطِ الْعُلَمَاءَ تَعْلَمْ
enWisdom: Oppose your [carnal] soul and you will become upright, mingle with scholars and you will learn
The misguidance of the soul is in obedience to it
Whoever obeys his soul kills it

Wisdom: مَنْ أَطَاعَ نَفْسَهُ فِي شَهَوَاتِهَا فَقَدْ أَعَانَهَا عَلَى هَلْكِهَا [هَلَكَتِهَا]
enWisdom: Whoever obeys his soul in its lustful desires has indeed helped to destroy it

Wisdom: لَا تَطْلُبَنَّ طَاعَةَ غَيْرِكَ وَطَاعَةُ نَفْسِكَ عَلَيْكَ مُمْتَنِعَةٌ
enWisdom: Never seek the obedience of others while your [own] soul refuses to obey you
